definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: This is the charge for your IDD calls.
I put through a long-distance call to a friend in Fuzhou this morning.
sentences.chinese: 的一个朋友打通了一个长途电话。

sentences.english: What kind of an asshole would call collect?
sentences.chinese: 什么傻瓜才接对方付费的长途电话？

sentences.english: Love is allowing the girl you love give inter-city calls to her grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 爱是允许女儿给她的祖父打长途电话。

sentences.english: I made a long-distance call to my wife, asking her to sell our house.
sentences.chinese: 我给妻子打了通长途电话，让她卖掉我们的房子。

sentences.english: As soon as he got Shanghai, he made a long distance call to me (he called me。)
sentences.chinese: 他一到上海就给我打了一个长途电话。

sentences.english: Purchase an international phone card and open an accessible email account.
sentences.chinese: 买一张国际长途电话卡，申请一个稳定的邮箱。

sentences.english: Can we make long-distant calls in the room?
sentences.chinese: 房间里可以打长途电话吗？

sentences.english: I'm waiting for a long-distance call from Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 我在等候从东京打来的长途电话。

sentences.english: Find the approximate percent decrease in the cost per minute of a long-distance call?
sentences.chinese: 请得出长途电话每分钟破费的大约增加的百分率？

sentences.english: Hello, operator, I'd like to place a long distance call to Chicago, U. S. A.
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员，我想打长途电话到美国芝加哥。

sentences.english: How can I make a direct long distance call from this phone?
sentences.chinese: 用这部电话我怎么打直拨长途电话？

sentences.english: Do you have a phone book (directory)? 55 I would like to make a long distance call to Taibei.
sentences.chinese: 我想打个长途电话到台北去。

sentences.english: Gone are the days when people waited in a queue to make a long-distance call.
sentences.chinese: 人们排队等着打长途电话的日子一去不复返了。

sentences.english: Can you arrange a long-distance call for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能为我摆设一下打个长途电话？

definition: to make a long distance call
to talk endlessly on the phone
to notify sb of a call/to call sb to the phone
